radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic with smooth contour, no focal liver mass, patent main portal vein, no ascites; no intrahepatic biliary dilation; gallbladder contains few gallstones, marked wall thickening and wall edema, not abnormally distended, no sonographic Murphy's sign; pancreas appears normal, spleen of normal echogenicity and size, limited views of kidneys show no hydronephrosis, simple cysts up to 4.4 cm in bilateral kidneys.
